descr: "Defines the characteristics of a message that can be shared between systems, including the type of event that initiates the message, the content to be transmitted and what response(s), if any, are permitted."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a MessageDefinition resource"

fields.name: url
fields.descr: "An absolute URI that is used to identify this message definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance. This SHALL be a URL, SHOULD be globally unique, and SHOULD be an address at which this message definition is (or will be) published. The URL SHOULD include the major version of the message definition. For more information see [Technical and Business Versions](resource.html#versions)."

fields.name: _url
fields.descr: "Extensions for url"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A formal identifier that is used to identify this message definition when it is represented in other formats, or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance."

fields.name: version
fields.descr: "The identifier that is used to identify this version of the message definition when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the message definition author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence."

fields.name: _version
fields.descr: "Extensions for version"

fields.name: name
fields.descr: "A natural language name identifying the message definition. This name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generation."

fields.name: _name
fields.descr: "Extensions for name"

fields.name: title
fields.descr: "A short, descriptive, user-friendly title for the message definition."

fields.name: _title
fields.descr: "Extensions for title"

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of this message definition. Enables tracking the life-cycle of the content."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: experimental
fields.descr: "A boolean value to indicate that this message definition is authored for testing purposes (or education/evaluation/marketing), and is not intended to be used for genuine usage."

fields.name: _experimental
fields.descr: "Extensions for experimental"

fields.name: date
fields.descr: "The date  (and optionally time) when the message definition was published. The date must change if and when the business version changes and it must change if the status code changes. In addition, it should change when the substantive content of the message definition changes."

fields.name: _date
fields.descr: "Extensions for date"

fields.name: publisher
fields.descr: "The name of the individual or organization that published the message definition."

fields.name: _publisher
fields.descr: "Extensions for publisher"

fields.name: contact
fields.descr: "Contact details to assist a user in finding and communicating with the publisher."

fields.name: description
fields.descr: "A free text natural language description of the message definition from a consumer's perspective."

fields.name: _description
fields.descr: "Extensions for description"

fields.name: useContext
fields.descr: "The content was developed with a focus and intent of supporting the contexts that are listed. These terms may be used to assist with indexing and searching for appropriate message definition instances."

fields.name: jurisdiction
fields.descr: "A legal or geographic region in which the message definition is intended to be used."

fields.name: purpose
fields.descr: "Explaination of why this message definition is needed and why it has been designed as it has."

fields.name: _purpose
fields.descr: "Extensions for purpose"

fields.name: copyright
fields.descr: "A copyright statement relating to the message definition and/or its contents. Copyright statements are generally legal restrictions on the use and publishing of the message definition."

fields.name: _copyright
fields.descr: "Extensions for copyright"

fields.name: base
fields.descr: "The MessageDefinition that is the basis for the contents of this resource."

fields.name: parent
fields.descr: "Identifies a protocol or workflow that this MessageDefinition represents a step in."

fields.name: replaces
fields.descr: "A MessageDefinition that is superseded by this definition."

fields.name: event
fields.descr: "A coded identifier of a supported messaging event."

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "The impact of the content of the message."

fields.name: _category
fields.descr: "Extensions for category"

fields.name: focus
fields.descr: "Identifies the resource (or resources) that are being addressed by the event.  For example, the Encounter for an admit message or two Account records for a merge."

fields.name: responseRequired
fields.descr: "Indicates whether a response is required for this message."

fields.name: _responseRequired
fields.descr: "Extensions for responseRequired"

fields.name: allowedResponse
fields.descr: "Indicates what types of messages may be sent as an application-level response to this message."
